description: Create search functionality tables and functions for full-text search and faceted filtering
rollback_sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS search_analytics CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS search_suggestions CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS search_index CASCADE; DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS search_videos CASCADE; DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS get_search_suggestions CASCADE; DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS get_search_facets CASCADE; DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS update_search_index_vectors CASCADE;
